Package coldbox.system.logging

Class Summary
AbstractAppender This is the abstract interface component for all LogBox Appenders
Layout This is a base custom layout for a message in an appender
LogBox This is LogBox, an enterprise logger
LogEvent Resembles a logging event within logBox
LogLevels The available log levels in LogBox
Logger This is a logging object that allows for all kinds of logging to occur within its appenders
